DOC.brief_summary: This study ass analgesic efficacy DSG 1 % compare placebo reduction pain associate DOMS
DOC.brief_title: A Within-subject Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Diclofenac Sodium Topical Gel 1 % Compared Placebo Subjects Experiencing Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 1835 year Not engage regular low extremity fitness activity past 6 month prior screen Willing refrain use ice , heat massage study DOMS score ≥4 Pain Rest ( PAR ) DOMS score ≥5 Pain Walking ( POW ) , moderate severe categorical scale Pain medication & corticosteroid prior randomization Topical analgesic antiinflammatory treatment previous month Body mass index > 32 kg/m2 Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
